issue.title: [C++][Parquet] Create nested reading benchmarks
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10024](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10024). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10024?focusedCommentId=17197058) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
This was the intent of https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8491, I'll close that as a duplicate.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10024?focusedCommentId=17197064) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
ARROW-8491 was taking about level decoding, so I assume that was for `level_conversion_benchmark.cc` ?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10024?focusedCommentId=17197065) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
ahh, I guess I kept had the two as synonymous in my mind, we can keep both.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10024?focusedCommentId=17197753) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8203
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8203>
